description:
A popular smartphone RPG`s data is getting erased, so that players` hard-leveled characters end up in their birthday suits! Meanwhile, interfaces across the city are starting to act like they`re part of the game!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sodateta Chara ga Supponpon!? Ropelemon no Gakkou Dungeon!
The Character I Leveled Up Is Naked?! Ropuremon`s School Dungeon!
育てたキャラがスッポンポン!? ロープレモンの学校ダンジョン!
